tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (SBAR (IN If) (S (NP (PRP you)) (VP (VBP get) (NP (NN something) (JJ other)) (PP (IN than) (NP (NP (DT a) (NN hug)) (PRN (: /) (NP (NP (NN giftcard)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NNP Christmas)))))))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (MD can) (VP (VB promise) (NP (PRP you)) (SBAR (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBD spent) (NP (DT a) (NN hella)) (NP-TMP (JJ long) (NN time)) (S (VP (VBG looking) (PP (IN for) (NP (PRP it))))))))))))
